details.songOfExultation: Angels We Have Heard on High #100

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: The Ladies’ Ornament Exchange is December 9 at 6:00 PM at Ann Deaton’s house. Please bring an appetizer or dessert; soup will be provided.

We are collecting Christmas cards among church members for the Lottie Moon Christmas Offering through Wednesday, December 18 at 6:00 PM, to hand them out on Sunday, December 22. Postage is $0.73 per card; cards can be given to Mike, Brian or Butch. Donations for the big screen are $100, and we need those as soon as possible. They can include either a card or digital picture.
We will pass out Christmas treat bags on December 22 after the morning worship service.
